NC.Q: Between 2002 and 2012, was the average total Book Sales higher or lower than between 2001 and 2015?
NC.A: The average total book sales between 2002 and 2012 was {higher} than between 2001 and 2015.

NC.Q: Between 2008 and 2013, did the total Book Sales experience a larger or smaller change than between 2009 and 2013?
